title: Disabled gamer now can't communicate in game,please help me?
body:
Hello I'm a LoL player with Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy, I adore LoL and Riot dearly. I was backstage at 2013 LCS,helped a team owner and visited their studio.   I use an on screen keyboard to type and the game makes me reclick after every letter typed, typing hey takes 15 seconds instead of 3.    Also, with the removal of the smart ping button ... I now have no way to communicate and people are calling me fa-----,retarded and to report me for no communication. It's extremely depressing .

this year, I want to get gold and will study to get there. Without communications ,I not sure I can. LoL is one of my few joys,can anybody help?
